title: The Return of Tank Fizz

embed.description: tank fizz is back in s7 bois song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXKSkdHVUzs

body: Made a video on tank fizz after the reworks, he seems pretty strong. Enjoy!  {{champion:105}}

replies.body: So basically a core  of {{item:3146}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3157}} into tank or Rylais?
yes this build, sunfire first usually against a heavy ad comp, spirit visage is also a must buy because it makes the healing from gunblade ridiculous

Lower mana costs, lower Cooldowns, W is now an Auto reset. 

Riot probably thought that would help Fizz Cause {{item:3100}}, then again we also have {{item:3078}} and {{item:3025}}. Kinda makes me wonder whether we will ever lose that level of Duality, on champs that want sheen proc.

BUILD PLZ 

OR A SKELETON WILL RATTLEL ITS BONES AT YOU
I can just see the amusement when riot gets wind of this.
What's the build? I wanna try this cancerous shit
Good news, will wait for nerfs
